DOC.criteria: Age 20 year old less 39 year old , married . Applicable ART control ovarian hyperstimulation , IVF/ET , ICSI , GIFT , ZIFT . Regular menstrual cycle ( 2535 day ) . 18kg/m2≤BMI＜30kg/m2 . The level basic serum FSH < 10IU / L 2nd5th day menstrual cycle , luteinizing hormone , estradiol progesterone level normal . The screening period recent three month vaginal ultrasound examination show shape bilateral ovarian uterine size normal 5 ≤ number basal antral follicle unilateral ovarian < 10 , follicular diameter < 10 mm . The vitro fertilization embryo transfer ( IVF/ET ) ( ) intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) technology less three time use prior reproductive treatment ( provide copy previous case ) . Volunteer participate sign informed consent . There high risk ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) , subject high response gonadotropin previous ovarian hyperstimulation cycle , polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) , subject severe OHSS cancellation cycle . Affect outcome pregnancyrelated disease ( one ) : untreated hydrosalpinx , untreated uterine polyp , untreated uterine infection , stage Ⅲ ~ IV endometriosis , ovarian cyst > 4cm , uterine fibroid diameter > 4cm , pelvic benign tumor > 4cm , pituitary tumor malignant tumor tissue organ . The subject abnormal uterine bleeding . Affect pregnancyrelated endocrine metabolic disease ( one ) : hyperprolactinemia , thyroid disease ( include hyperthyroidism , hypothyroidism ) , hyperandrogenism , adrenal dysfunction ( include adrenal hyperfunction , adrenal cortical dysfunction ) . The subject severe liver kidney dysfunction , level serum alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) 2.5 time high upper limit normal value , serum creatinine ( Cr ) urea nitrogen ( BUN ) 2 time high upper limit normal value . Severe heart disease , unstable angina pectoris , heart failure grade Ⅲ , acute myocardial infarction and/or old myocardial infarction , hypertension diagnose accord 2010 edition Chinese Hypertension Prevention Guidelines . The subject contraindication allergic history gonadotropinreleasing hormone agonist ( GnRHa ) , rFSH/human menopausal gonadotropin ( hMG ) , human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) , progesterone drug .
